thread.section_title: Mychoicesoftware Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mychoicesoftware | mychoicesoftware.com
thread.title: Pat

author: Pat
title: Pat
text: I was a long time user of Microsoft Access until I went from XP to Windows 10. Yes, I kept XP because of Access. Jake F. helped me choose exactly the right program for my needs and at a good cost. He remembered me from a month ago because this, for me, was a big purchase. I was very nervous about downloading a program and having problems but he was super. Very happy with My Choice Software and with Jake. He is a real asset to your company. I will definitely recommend your firm.
